thread.title: TBNG Consulting Donates $2,500 To American Legion Post 127
thread.title_full: TBNG Consulting Donates $2,500 To American Legion Post 127

author: Michael Grande
title: TBNG Consulting Donates $2,500 To American Legion Post 127
text:
On September 4th, TBNG Consulting donated $2500.00 to American Legion Post 127 located in Orange, CT. Michael Grande, Managing Director of TBNG Consulting, presented the check to Commander Lou Merritt in a ceremony attended by partners, Jeffrey Grande and Michael Paone, and the officers of American Legion Post 127: Commander Lou Merritt, Chair of the House Committee Rich Cenami, Historian Don Jewel, Adjutant Peter McDonald, and Sergeant At Arms Phillip W. Grande Sr. The donation proceeds will help bolster current fundraising in light of the recent cancelled annual golf tournament and gun show event. Michael Grande states, “The American Legion is a long standing and generous organization, which provides numerous scholarships, services, and support for not only veterans but also local students and families throughout the area. TBNG Consulting is honored to be a part of the commitment and support of active military, esteemed veterans, and all the people the American Legion helps in times of need.”
The American Legion was chartered and incorporated in 1919 and is the largest veteran service organization open to all honorably discharged veterans and current U.S. military personnel. It is committed to mentoring youth, inspiring communities, advocating patriotism, and promoting a strong national spirit. The organization is active in Boys State, Girls State, American Legion Baseball, American Legion Riders, Sons of the American Legion, scouting, junior shooting events, and local, state, and national scholarship opportunities. The American Legion is a non-profit organization and relies on members and volunteers to drive their passion for promoting success in the community.
About TBNG Consulting
TBNG Consulting is a leading provider of Professional and Managed Services for integrated IT solutions supporting the New England area. We create, implement, and support highly scalable and secure network related technologies for banking, business, education, medical, non-profit, and government organizations. Through proactive network strategies, TBNG Consulting creates a Defense in Depth layered approach to security, which protects organizations against threats in a 24/7 environment and enables optimal efficiency of critical data using cost-effective solutions. TBNG Consulting delivers value to organizations by engineering IT solutions to fit our client needs with a philosophy driven by experience, product expertise, and customer commitment. please visit: http://www.tbngconsulting.com .
